item.description:
Fifty years ago the Boston Red Sox beat the St Louis Browns 29-4. Tonight the Sox play the Cleveland Indians, and we’re not making any calls.

We are going to be workshopping for our superstar writer this week, John. Check out his screenplay in the files section, and come prepared to cheer and comment on his work.

Please, no plastic horns or noisemakers.

We’re done at 8:30, so you can still catch the last few innings of the Sox game.
item.how_to_find_us: Organizers (team managers) will be wearing Sox caps.
item.name: And tonight's Workshop team is...
